title: Prologue
body:
The Great Pacific Garbage Patch is bigger than expected. 
And it's constantly expanding. 
The drifting island of plastic waste is now three times the size of France.
If we continue to use synthetic materials, the whole ocean will become covered by a giant plastic cape...
<<changeImage PrologueView 1>>
<<sound SoundView 1>>
OH NO !!!!
They will get rid of me!
I have to get out of here, but I won't manage to do that on my own.
<<changeScene PrologueView 1>>
